To define the beginning of an HTML table, use the TABLEOPEN Procedure. textAfterTable: Examples This procedure generates cvalue TABLEHEADER Procedure This procedure generates the and tags which insert a header cell in an HTML table. The tag is similar to the tag except that the text in this case the rows are usually rendered in bold type. Syntax HTP.TABLEHEADER( cvalue IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, calign IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, cdp IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, cnowrap IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, crowspan IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, ccolspan IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, cattributes IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL); Parameters Table 184-84 TABLEHEADER Procedure Parameters Parameter Description cvalue The data for the cell in the table. calign The value for the ALIGN attribute. cdp The value for the DP attribute.
